messages.subject: FREE Giveaway of Gojou Hajime!
messages.msgSnippet: ***Warning:  Contains homo-erotica material.  If you find this sort of material offensive, please ignore the rest of this post. Gojou Thomas has a FREE copy
messages.messageBody:
***Warning: Contains 'homo-erotica' material. If you find this sort
of material offensive, please ignore the rest of this post.

Gojou Thomas has a FREE copy
of Gojou Hajime (Novel) to give out to a lucky winner!

***You must be a MEMBER and logged in to read more and participate***

That's right! Gojou Thomas will be flinging a couple of copies out to
the lucky winners for the month of October. Want to be one of the
lucky ones to receive your FREE novel?

All you have to do is go to http://samurai-on-samurai.com to get the
details. Yes! That is all you have to participate in this GIVEAWAY.

PLEASE NOTE:
Persons having less than adult status should NOT enter contest.

Winners will be notified by email during the 1st week of November.
